brief_title: Darbepoetin Alfa Administered Once Every 4 Weeks in the Treatment of Subjects With Anemia of Cancer
brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to demonstrate benefit with respect to hematopoietic response in subjects with anemia of cancer randomized to Darbepoetin Alfa once every 4 weeks.
criteria: Eligibility Criteria: - Subjects with non-myeloid malignancies - Subjects can not be on chemotherapy - Anemia of cancer - Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) status of 0 to 2 - Hemoglobin less than or equal to 11.0 g/dL - Adequate renal and liver function - Written informed consent
